mapper.insert: INSERT INTO achievement (user_id, type, title, description, badge_url, unlock_condition, unlocked, is_unlocked, unlocked_time, unlocked_at, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{type}, #{title}, #{description}, #{badgeUrl}, #{unlockCondition}, #{unlocked}, #{isUnlocked}, #{unlockedTime}, #{unlockedAt}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE achievement SET unlocked = #{unlocked}, is_unlocked = #{isUnlocked}, unlocked_time = #{unlockedTime}, unlocked_at = #{unlockedAt}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, type, title, description, badge_url, unlock_condition, unlocked, is_unlocked, unlocked_time, unlocked_at, create_time, update_time FROM achievement WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id, user_id, type, title, description, badge_url, unlock_condition, unlocked, is_unlocked, unlocked_time, unlocked_at, create_time, update_time FROM achievement WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT id, user_id, type, title, description, badge_url, unlock_condition, unlocked, is_unlocked, unlocked_time, unlocked_at, create_time, update_time FROM achievement WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND (unlocked = true OR is_unlocked = 1) ORDER BY unlocked_time DESC
